key_changes: Added Validate() method to Measurement struct
Added basic validation for Measurement ID and Timestamp
Added Validate() method to Session struct
Implemented comprehensive validation for Session attributes

patterns_discovered: Validation pattern with custom ValidationError struct
Cascading validation for nested structs (Conversations, Measurements)
Defensive validation of struct fields before processing
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle nil slice elements during validation
Timestamp zero-value checking for time-related fields
Proper ordering of time-based fields (EndedAt after StartedAt)
recommendations: Consider adding more granular error details in ValidationError
Create utility functions for common validation patterns
Add validation to JSON marshaling/unmarshaling methods
